Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Belmont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Belmont.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
